CLAN.command.create.error.name.lenght.de-DE: [grey]Der Clan Name darf [red]nicht länger</color> als [era_purple]16 Zeichen</color> sein!</color>
CLAN.command.create.error.name.lenght.en-US: [grey]The clan name [red]can't be longer</color> than [era_purple]16 characters!</color></color>

CLAN.command.create.error.tagline.lenght.de-DE: [grey]Die Clan Tagline darf [red]nicht länger</color> als [era_purple]8 Zeichen</color> sein!</color>
CLAN.command.create.error.tagline.lenght.en-US: [grey]The clan tagline [red]can't be longer</color> than [era_purple]8 characters!</color></color>

CLAN.command.create.error.tag.lenght.de-DE: [grey]Der Clan Tag darf [red]nicht länger</color> als [era_purple]12 Zeichen</color> sein!</color>
CLAN.command.create.error.tag.lenght.en-US: [grey]The clan tag [red]can't be longer</color> than [era_purple]12 characters!</color></color>

CLAN.command.invite.error.no.permission.de-DE: [grey]Du musst der Clan [red]Owner</color> oder ein Clan <red>Admin</color> sein um das zu tun!</color>
CLAN.command.invite.error.no.permission.en-US: [grey]You must be the clan [red]owner</color> or a clan <red>admin</color> to do that!</color>

CLAN.command.invite.error.already.invite.en-US: [grey]This player [red]is already</color> invited to join the clan!</color>

CLAN.command.invite.success.en-US: [grey]You have successfully invited [era_purple][player]</color> to your clan!</color>

CLAN.invite.receive.de-DE: [grey][era_purple][player]</color> hat dich eingeladen, dem Clan [era_purple][name]#[tagline]</color> ([era_purple][id]</color>) beizutreten! Nutze [era_purple]<hover:show_text:'[era_purple]Klicke zum ausführen</color>'><click:run_command:'/clan invite accept [name]#[tagline]'>/clan invite accept [name]#[tagline]</click></hover:show_text></color> um die Einladung anzunehmen!</color>
CLAN.invite.receive.en-US: [grey][era_purple][player]</color> has invited you to join the clan [era_purple][name]#[tagline]</color> ([era_purple][id]</color>)! Use [era_purple]<hover:show_text:'[era_purple]Klicke zum ausführen</color>'><click:run_command:'/clan invite accept [name]#[tagline]'>/clan invite accept [name]#[tagline]</click></hover:show_text></color> to accept the invitation!</color>

CLAN.command.invite.deny.de-DE: [grey]Du hast die Einladung zum Clan [era_purple][name]#[tagline]</color> ([era_purple][id]</color>) abgelehnt!</color>
CLAN.command.invite.deny.en-US: [grey]You denied the invitation to the clan [era_purple][name]#[tagline]</color> ([era_purple][id]</color>)!</color>

CLAN.command.invite.accept.error.not.inv.en-US: [grey]You were [red]not invited</color> to join this clan!</color>

CLAN.command.invite.remove.de-DE: [grey]Du hast die Einladung von [era_purple][player]</color> zum Clan [era_purple][name]#[tagline]</color> ([era_purple][id]</color>) [green]erfolgreich</color> entfernt!</color>
CLAN.command.invite.remove.en-US: [grey]You have successfully removed the invitation of [era_purple][player]</color> to the clan [era_purple][name]#[tagline]</color> ([era_purple][id]</color>)!</color>

CLAN.command.invite.remove.error.not.inv.en-US: [grey][era_purple][player]</color> is [red]not</color> invited to join the clan!</color>

CLAN.command.create.error.name.unicode.de-DE: [grey]Der Clan Name darf [red]keine</color> Unicode Zeichen enthalten!</color>

CLAN.command.create.error.tagline.unicod.de-DE: [grey]Die Clan Tagline darf [red]keine</color> Unicode Zeichen enthalten!</color>

CLAN.command.create.error.tag.unicode.de-DE: [grey]Der Clan Tag darf [red]keine</color> Unicode Zeichen enthalten!</color>

CLAN.command.create.error.name.blacklist.de-DE: [grey]Dein Clan Name enthält ein [red]Verbotenes Wort!</color> Wenn du denkst, dass das ein [red]Fehler</color> ist, kontaktiere unseren Support ([era_purple]/discord</color>).</color>
CLAN.command.create.error.name.blacklist.en-US: [grey]Your clan name contains a [red]blacklisted word!</color> If you think this is a [red]mistake</color>, please contact our support ([era_purple]/discord</color>).</color>

CLAN.command.create.error.tagline.blackl.de-DE: [grey]Deine Clan Tagline enthält ein [red]Verbotenes Wort!</color> Wenn du denkst, dass das ein [red]Fehler</color> ist, kontaktiere unseren Support ([era_purple]/discord</color>).</color>
CLAN.command.create.error.tagline.blackl.en-US: [grey]Your clan tagline contains a [red]blacklisted word!</color> If you think this is a [red]mistake</color>, please contact our support ([era_purple]/discord</color>).</color>

CLAN.command.create.error.tag.blackliste.de-DE: [grey]Dein Clan Tag enthält ein [red]Verbotenes Wort!</color> Wenn du denkst, dass das ein [red]Fehler</color> ist, kontaktiere unseren Support ([era_purple]/discord</color>).</color>
CLAN.command.create.error.tag.blackliste.en-US: [grey]Your clan tag contains a [red]blacklisted word!</color> If you think this is a [red]mistake</color>, please contact our support ([era_purple]/discord</color>).</color>

CLAN.command.leave.error.owner.de-DE: [grey]Du kannst den Clan [red]nicht verlassen</color>, da du der Clan Leader bist! Bitte lösche den Clan stattdessen!</color>
CLAN.command.leave.error.owner.en-US: [grey]You can't leave the clan, because you are the clan leader! Please delete the clan instead!</color>

CLAN.command.kick.error.no.permission.de-DE: [grey]Du musst der Clan [red]Owner</color> oder ein Clan <red>Admin</color> sein um das zu tun!</color>
CLAN.command.kick.error.no.permission.en-US: [grey]You must be the clan [red]owner</color> or a clan <red>admin</color> to do that!</color>

CLAN.command.kick.success.en-US: [grey]You have successfully kicked [era_purple][player]</color> from your clan!</color>

CLAN.kick.info.de-DE: [grey][era_purple][player]</color> hat dich aus dem Clan [era_purple][name]#[tagline]</color> ([era_purple][id]</color>) gekickt!</color>
CLAN.kick.info.en-US: [grey][era_purple][player]</color> has kicked you from the clan [era_purple][name]#[tagline]</color> ([era_purple][id]</color>)!</color>

CLAN.command.role.error.invalid.role.de-DE: [grey]Die Rolle [red][role]</color> ist ungültig! Gültige Rollen sind: [era_purple]Admin, Member</color></color>
CLAN.command.role.error.invalid.role.en-US: [grey]The role [red][role]</color> is invalid! Valid roles are: [era_purple]Admin, Member</color></color>

CLAN.command.role.error.no.permission.de-DE: [grey]Du musst der Clan [red]Owner</color> sein um das zu tun!</color>
CLAN.command.role.error.no.permission.en-US: [grey]You must be the clan [red]owner</color> to do that!</color>

CLAN.command.role.success.de-DE: [grey]Du hast die Rolle von [era_purple][player]</color> auf [era_purple][role]</color> gesetzt!</color>
CLAN.command.role.success.en-US: [grey]You have set the role of [era_purple][player]</color> to [era_purple][role]!</color></color>

CLAN.command.sethome.success.de-DE: [grey]Du hast das [era_purple]Clan Home</color> erfolgreich auf deine [era_purple]aktuelle Position</color> gesetzt!</color>
CLAN.command.sethome.success.en-US: [grey]You have successfully set the [era_purple]clan home</color> to your [era_purple]current position!</color></color>

CLAN.command.sethome.error.no.permission.de-DE: [grey]Du musst der Clan [red]Owner</color> sein um das zu tun!</color>
CLAN.command.sethome.error.no.permission.en-US: [grey]You must be the clan [red]owner</color> to do that!</color>

CLAN.command.home.success.teleport.en-US: [grey]You have been teleported to the [era_purple]clan home</color>!</color>

CLAN.command.home.teleport.error.de-DE: [grey]Beim Teleportieren ist ein [red]Fehler</color> aufgetreten! Bitte kontaktiere unseren Support ([era_purple]/discord</color>).</color>
CLAN.command.home.teleport.error.en-US: [grey]An error occurred while teleporting! Please contact our support ([era_purple]/discord</color>).</color>

CLAN.command.home.teleport.teleport.erro.de-DE: [grey]Der Teleportationsvorgang wurde [red]abgebrochen,</color> da du dich bewegt hast!</color>
CLAN.command.home.teleport.teleport.erro.en-US: [grey]The teleportation process was [red]cancelled</color> because you moved!</color>

CLAN.command.home.teleport.cooldown.en-US: [grey]ʏᴏᴜ ᴀʀᴇ ɢᴏɪɴɢ ᴛᴏ ʙᴇ ᴛᴇʟᴇᴘᴏʀᴛᴇᴅ ɪɴ [era_purple][duration] ꜱᴇᴄᴏɴᴅꜱ</color></color>

CLAN.command.setting.name.error.no.permi.en-US: [grey]You must be the clan [red]owner</color> to do that!</color>
